act(Game) - Method in class advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.character.CharacterManager
For every NonPlayerCharacter in the game, invoke their act method and let them do something within the game world.
act(Game) - Method in class advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.character.NonPlayerCharacter
Let the NPC act out a behaviour, by default this method will generate a random value to determine whether this NPC should move rooms.

action(Game, CommandExecution) - Method in class advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.cmds.builtin.TakeCommand
